alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 22 at 1:29AM AKDT until April 24 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations of one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. North winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Southeastern Brooks Range near Passes. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow are occuring in passes. North winds gusting to 40 mph will continue through Monday morning. Snow will taper off Saturday and visibility will improve slightly. Winds will taper off on Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
